source.guidance: The built-in command **echo** displays text in the terminal ending with a new line character, while the **printf** built-in command also displays the text to the terminal but without the new line character at the end.
source.instructions:
### Fill in the blanks to complete the statement.

source.name: Built-In Commands
source.text: The built-in command <<<echo>>> displays text in the terminal ending with a new line character, while the <<<printf>>> built-in command also displays the text to the terminal but without the new line character at the end.

text: displays text in the terminal ending with a new line character, while the
built-in command also displays the text to the terminal but without the new line character at the end.
